nodes.text: Kai toks were flying predators of Rori.
Not much was known about this reptilian like creature. Until more research was done, Imperial scientists recommended that spacers stay away from them, unless they were members of the Rebel Alliance.

They could in fact be trained as personal companions. They were part of the Reptavian family, and could be mutated into horned raptors. Unlike normal kai toks, horned raptors could not fly, and had a considerably different appearance.
